text: 1:21-23 Aposel 9:30Egha kɨ gɨn Jerusalem ategha ghua Sirian Provins ko Silisian Provins bar aningɨn aven arui. Kɨ kamaghɨn amima, Judian Distrighɨn aven itir Kraisɨn adarazi me tong nan guamɨn ganizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ gumazamizir maba ghaze, Pol fomɨra en nɨghnɨzir gavgavir Godɨn itim gasɨghasɨghasa osɨmtɨziba e garɨsi. Egha datɨrɨghɨn gumazir kamra Godɨn Akar Aghuim gumazamizibav kɨra ghaze, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn ikɨ.
